com.googlecode.jinahya.util.fsm

Interface ResourceLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassResourceLoader, FileResourceLoader

    public interface ResourceLoader
    Platform specific resource loader.
    Author:
    Jin Kwon

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream loadResource(String name)
      Loads resource denoted by given resourceName.

    • Method Detail

      • loadResource

        InputStream loadResource(String name)
                         throws IOException,
                                FSMException
        Loads resource denoted by given resourceName.
        Parameters:
        name - resource name
        Returns:
        loaded resource stream; never null
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        FSMException - if an error occurs
